About.Hours & facilities: Open Monday, Wednesday and Friday 9am-2pm by appointment only.

About.Access: Intending researchers should make an appointment with the Archivist to discuss their research needs. Access fees are payable. Bona fide research for non profit purposes exempt from fees.

About.Acquisition focus: Permanent records of Brisbane City Council since 1925.

About.Major holdings: Brisbane City Council: Minutes 1859- (20m); Plans 1860s-1930s. Brisbane City Council and previous Councils: Photographs 1890s-(5.5m). Aerial Photographs, building registers, land use survey maps
